name: Matesguay
description:
version:2.0.1
This application aims to enhance mental arithmetic skills. Inspired by the game RISK, this educational game replaces soldiers with deputies and wars with voting. Traditional dice have been replaced with mental arithmetic challenges.

name: RepSpace
description: In this game, players program a blue oriented circle to navigate through a maze of obstacles by arranging a sequence of directional arrows. The challenge lies in planning an efficient path to reach the goal while avoiding obstacles along the way. Based on 42 french school admission tests.
